name: Word Bounce 3D
description:
Buh Oh! Wordman better stop the Evil Dr. Letters before he destroys the world!
but wait... if dr letters is gone, does wordman lose his powers?

Attack Dr. Letters by collecting the letters in the right order to spell the word at the top of the skren.

Made for the Chain Letter Jam started by Miziziziz. 

This is the chain of games that led to this one:
Word Bounce by Vimlark
Wordman Saves the Day by Nartier(miziziziz)

Controls:
Move: A & D or Left & Right Arrows
Parachute (When Falling): W or Space or Up Arrow
Fast fall: D or Down Arrow

The game has 3 different endings.

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).
